		Question: where are the timezones in the usa
		Answer:
answer: Sure, here is the answer to this question: The time zones in the USA are the same as the US time zones, which comprise the whole of the United States of America. There are a total of 6 time zones across the country, spanning from the West Coast to the East Coast. The time zone name generally offers the name of the city that is most centrally located in that particular zone. Here are the time zones in each state, listed by state name: Alaska
